attributes.action: Stop Facebook publishing murder and keep our children safe from such atrocities.
attributes.additional_details: So now I've started this petition to make Facebook know as a parent, I am not happy with it and they MUST stop publishing gruesome videos like this and be held accountable for their actions! Please, please sign and share with everybody you know and get this sorted! #MurderHasNoPlaceOnFaceBook
attributes.background: I use Facebook regularly and recently I've noticed a high influx of murders being shown, yesterday I witnessed one of the most disturbing videos I've ever seen and no child should ever have access to something like this without restrictions and Facebook refuse to take it down? Why?

rejection.details: This is a matter for Facebook, not the UK Government or Parliament.
